title: v0.11.21 web GUI refreshes endlessly

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
I'm running v0.11.21 of Syncthing on Debian Jessie (`3.16.0-4-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 3.16.7-ckt11-1+deb8u3 (2015-08-04) x86_64 GNU/Linux`). When I attempt to access the web GUI, running on `0.0.0.0:8384`, the page refreshes endlessly, preventing me from changing anything. This problem was not present in v0.11.20. My Syncthing server is connected to one other device, sharing one folder.
Here is the error in the JavaScript console (angular.min.js:216):  


In addition, the Syncthing server responds with 500 to requests for `http://[address]:[port]/rest/system/upgrade`
